installCommand: if [ -d frontend_suitube ]; then cd frontend_suitube; elif [ -d ../frontend_suitube ]; then cd ../frontend_suitube; else echo 'frontend_suitube directory not found'; exit 1; fi && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
buildCommand: if [ -d frontend_suitube ]; then cd frontend_suitube; elif [ -d ../frontend_suitube ]; then cd ../frontend_suitube; else echo 'frontend_suitube directory not found'; exit 1; fi && pnpm run build && rm -rf ../dist && cp -R dist ../dist
